project_info.prompt: Build a Purchase Management system for the Manufacturing Company

system.name: Manufacturing Purchase Management Workflow System (MPMWS)
system.description: End-to-end workflow management system for manufacturing procurement covering requisition to payment, including approvals, sourcing, PO issuance, supplier fulfillment, quality inspection, GRN, invoice matching, and payment release. Designed for traceability, SLA monitoring (planned vs actual), and audit-ready documentation across all purchase transactions.

sheets.name: Purchase Workflow Register
sheets.description: Primary workflow sheet tracking each purchase transaction from PR to closure with sequential stage milestones (Planned/Actual/Delay) and stage-specific operational fields.

columns.name: Overall Status
columns.description: Current overall workflow status (e.g., In Progress, On Hold, Closed)

columns.name: Current Stage No
columns.description: Current stage number where the transaction is pending

columns.name: Created By
columns.description: User who created the workflow record

columns.name: On Hold YN
columns.description: Indicates if the transaction is on hold

columns.name: Last Updated On
columns.description: Last update timestamp for the record

columns.name: ProjectWork Order No
columns.description: Project or work order reference (if applicable)

columns.name: Required By Date
columns.description: Date by which material/service is required

columns.name: Estimated Unit Price
columns.description: Estimated unit price at PR stage

columns.name: Estimated Total Value
columns.description: Estimated total value at PR stage

columns.name: PR Attachment Ref
columns.description: Reference to PR documents in repository

columns.name: Approver Role
columns.description: Role of approver (e.g., HOD, Plant Head, Finance)

columns.name: Rework Count
columns.description: Number of times PR was returned for correction

columns.name: Release Mode EmailPortalEDI
columns.description: How PO was released to supplier

columns.name: ShortExcess Qty
columns.description: Difference between ordered and received quantity

columns.name: Serial Nos Ref
columns.description: Reference to serial numbers list (if applicable)

columns.name: 3-Way Match Status MatchedException
columns.description: Match status between PO, GRN, and Invoice

columns.name: Due Date
columns.description: Payment due date as per terms

stages.stage_name: Goods Receipt Note GRN  Store Inward

sheets.name: Item Master
sheets.description: Reference master for materials/services used in PR/PO lines.

sheets.name: Vendor Master
sheets.description: Supplier master including compliance and payment details.

sheets.name: DepartmentCost Center Master
sheets.description: Departments and cost centers for budget tagging and reporting.

sheets.name: Tax Code Master
sheets.description: Tax codes and rates used for PO and invoice validation.

sheets.name: Payment Terms Master
sheets.description: Standard payment terms for vendors and POs.

sheets.name: Approval Matrix
sheets.description: Approval routing rules by spend category, plant, department, and value thresholds.

sheets.name: Status Master
sheets.description: Standardized statuses for workflow and stage outcomes.

sheets.name: Document Repository Index
sheets.description: Index of documents stored externally (DMS/Drive) linked to Purchase ID and stage.

sheets.name: Import Dump - PRPOGRNInvoice
sheets.description: Optional dump/import sheet for bulk uploads from ERP or legacy systems; used for staging before validation into the main register.
